channel.title: What should i do?
channel.description:
Well... I just heard yesterday when "She" was speaking to one guy at our class, about some movie, and later that day i heard that "She" went to "Guy" watch that movie... I don't think that's serious, but "She" and the "Guy" were (I really can't speak good english) umm.. together(?) about 2 years ago, and i just heard from my friend that "She" and the "Guy" went watching ice hockey match.. What should i do? Yeah. I am really (hmm) despressed(?) for asking here at mopar for that but, i just need help...
No, don't flame me. No, don't suggest to me to "Follow her to home and rape her" No, don't suggest me to kill anyone Suggest freely to kill myself No, don't suggest me to physically harm anyone (badly), i live in Finland, and it's bad thing here, (maybe) not in America.. YES, I LOVE HER
And, DON'T spam here, spam somewhere else...
(I'm not releasing names, they are now "She" and "Guy")

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Jei jei KK:

No, don’t suggest me to physically harm anyone (badly), i live in Finland, and it’s bad thing here, (maybe) not in America…

actually, i did?

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Death_666:

you could buy a basement i saw a nice 100 sq foot one at walmart for 20 bucks

[size=7]NO!!![/size]

And, i live in FINLAND, not america

The Un-Named:

Seriously, she’s not worth it. She likes someone else and what are the chances of you and her dying old together? I mean you could have a shot at it, but like you, and I say she likes this other guy.

I don’t care what you say, I still love her :o

edit: … It wasn’t always like this… Damn that “friend”… I would suicided then, but it just wasn’t my fault… Maybe 49% was my fault…

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Death_666:

well if you kill anyone… kill your self? lock “guy” in your basement and tourcher him?

No.

  1. I don’t have basement
  2. I get caught
  3. Suicide…Mmm…

[quote=“frank_, post:3, topic:22001”]suicide != cool

yea, you could always abduct the guy[/quote]

No

  1. Suicide != cool = True…
    I almost suicided few months ago, i’m not gonna post reason but, i were on (hmm… Can’t get it on my mind now…) “top of our home” for few minutes, thinking about my life… You can guess what i did, if im here writing

edit: Should i write whole story to Rewiews and Writing, but with my real good english it wouldn’t be such a good idea.

Read full topic
